website_summaries.verdict: Less sleek than some of the other options, but provides more room for extra carrying capacity.
pros: Tons of pockets and extra compartments to transport everything you need
Looks small, but fits it all!
Even includes a zippered shoe compartment
cons: Some of the colors (red and pink in particular) don't look the way they are advertised

customer_reviews.title: Bag on a 1st grade girl
customer_reviews.text: Someone asked about if it was an ok size for a kindergartner. Here is a pic of it on a first grader. Love the bag!
customer_reviews.author: momof3

customer_reviews.title: Hustle 3.0 > Hustle 2.0
customer_reviews.text: I had the Hustle 2.0 bag before that I really enjoyed using. I wanted to order another one since my previous one started showing wear and tear. However, for some reason they were more expensive here on Amazon then this version. After ordering one, I was very skeptical at first because I was not a big fan of the pocket at the bottom and thinking that the size seemed smaller than the 2.0 style. To my surprise, while this bag may not seem sleek when full, it has a larger capacity size than the previous model. Overall, I am very satisfied with this bag and would buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: iPurchase

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, big with lots of separate compartments
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, big with lots of separate compartments. My oldest son uses it for college, and my junior high son has one as well. It's comfortable to carry, and they never struggle to get all of their books and sports gear into it.
customer_reviews.author: A Nelson

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for travel. The time between flights ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for travel. The time between flights has gotten shorter and having to wait at the ramp for my "carryon" bag was getting to be a problem. This holds everything I had in the carryon bag and always makes it on the plane!
customer_reviews.author: PNC

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack! The colors are even better in person vs the picture. It has lots of different storage areas and is a great size.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great looking backpack but not durable enough
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack mostly, but one of the drink holders tore a hole in it within about 4 months. We are sending it back for a warranty replacement and will see what happens. I appreciate them standing by their products, but they need to make all parts of the backpack durable. The rest of it so far has held up.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, durable and tons of space!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is awesome! Not only does it look good but it’s extremely functional. Inside the front zipper are pockets to help organize and keep small things from falling to the Bottom. The front pocket is as deep as the entire bag. The main pocket is HUGE! You can fit so much in this backpack. It’s also very comfortable , even when packed heavy. And the material is a durable and high quality. The bottom Of the bag has a zipper pouch so you can fit shoes or other items in there so they don’t dirty the rest of your bag
customer_reviews.author: Jenniek41908

customer_reviews.title: Very nice backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son this school year. I was nervous at first that the green might be a little faded or dull color but looks even better in person then in the picture! Perfect size for my 9 year old and the colors are nice and bright. Very happy with my purchase and so is my boy :)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Too small Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: I used to own TYR Alliance Team II Backpack but the material on bottom deteriorated and developed a hole after 3 years. But this backpack is small. It can't possibly hold all the things I put in a backpack to work like thermos, protein shakes, plastic container to hold ID badge and calculator, comb, small notebook and clip board, sonicaire toothbrush container and small plastic container with cell phone. The price is so high it makes me think I have to pay double to get a much bigger backpack. But how long will it last before I spend more money?
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Mayer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this backpack
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this backpack.....Great quality, love the under pocket for shoes/boots, etc separate from school supplies and papers/folders. Love all the different compartments and the look is stylish and comfortable yet slim to be carried easily for my 10 year old! This is the first time I envision it lasting more than a year of abuse from a child..
customer_reviews.author: R Jung

customer_reviews.title: awesome backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 13 year old daughter! She loves it.. Its very big and will fit everything she would need for school and sports! We have always love UA products and this one did not disappoint! the color we have is the navy blue with coral, its very pretty.. Not too super girly like a hot pink, but a nice subtle touch!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy backpack
customer_reviews.text: My high school freshman son loves all things Under Armour, so when his backpack was wearing out, this was the natural choice for a replacement. It has lots of storage space for his books, folders, laptop and charger, etc, and he says it's comfortable to carry around all day. He's in ROTC and uses the bottom pouch to carry his PT gear - he said it's big enough to put his lunchbox in, but doesn't want to squish his lunch under all the other things in the bag. All in all, it's a great bag, and made my Under Armour fan very happy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Foust

customer_reviews.title: The gym bag
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of UA products. This has plenty of storage and a spot for either a wet towel or shoes. I am all about compartments and this one has it! I got this for the gym and hope it lasts! The material seems like it would. My only complaint and hence the 4 out of 5, is the color is not true to the picture. It is quite lighter than what is shown!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5th grader to take to school. It holds all his stuff. A 1” binder, lunch box and a few misc library books and folders. He can even shove his sweatshirt in there with all of those things when he decides he’s done with it. We got the dark camo color. He loves this pattern. It’s dark and subtle. Not an in-your-face camo.
customer_reviews.author: Christie276

customer_reviews.title: Back to School Bag
customer_reviews.text: I have bought my son several back packs for every year (5) he has been in school and they last however he is getting older and needed a "big boys" back pack. This back pack is perfect because it is durable, water proof and has several pockets for his many uses. Most important my son loves the back pack and he will have it for another school year, which I love. If and when my son needs another back pack, I will defiantly purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: I love it for the space and design!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has so much space! I was getting so frustrated with my previous backpack because i could never fit my large binder in easy.. no issues with this one. And, it has deep side pockets which are great for water bottles
customer_reviews.author: Renee Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space, I get lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand, so you can't go wrong. It comes in many colors, I got the white with gray.. Has a spot for laptops and other electronics with the soft material to keep from scratching any expensive equipment. There is a bottom zipper to hold an extra pair of shoes ( or anything you want).. The one thing I didn't like was the front zip pocket wasn't waterproof, so don't leave any wires in that compartment (it never claimed to be waterproof, but just a heads up).. Lots of space though, I love it
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: You need this now!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is total badass! Great soft lining it some parts! 3 huge compartments! Plus 1 on the bottom! This thing is amazing! Only bad thing is that it is spose to come with a zippered compartment for electronics Which I didn’t get!!!!!😡
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality bookbag
customer_reviews.text: These bookbags are the best! Bought each of my boys one last year as well. They held up the entire year, no tears or anything! I purchased one more because my youngest son got his dirty using it for baseball travel over the summer. My oldest son's was in such great condition that we used it again this school year. These bags have an excellent amount of storage space, can be easily wiped off, and hold up extremely well. I'll never purchase another brand again! Way better quality than Nike bags!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Queen

customer_reviews.title: Nice back pack
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old wanted this bag for school. I happened to snag it as a deal of the day and got it for an awesome price. So he was super excited he got the bag he wanted and I was excited I got it for a great deal!! Hes used it for 1 year and it has held up well. He always has it packed full with books and such. For reference hes in 6th grade and it works nicely for him. Hes planning on using it for another year and I would love it if it held up for several more. We shall see I guess!
customer_reviews.author: geotraxmaniac

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I burnt a cigarette hole into the side compromising the integrity of the watersealant. It's very comfortable use it everyday and has held up carrying my 10 lbs chain and clothes it seems to be great. Valuable compartment keeps glasses and cellphone scratch free Chief complaints: shoe compartment is stupid as even a size 8 or 10 are difficult to get in. Does not hold as much as a bag of equal dimensions due to the compartmentalized structure
customer_reviews.author: jkjkhardcore

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, durable, waterproof! Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This bag outlasts all others that we previously purchased. My son, who doesn’t have time to go to his locker carries all of his books all of the time. Most of his previous bags were busted on the bottom by the end of the year, but not this one. This bag has wide, padded straps that help make it comfortable. This is our second one only because the logo was a bit scratched off the one we used last year and he wanted a different color. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice Size and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my teenage daughter, her school doesn't have lockers so she needs a substantial size bag to carry everything all day long and comfortable straps are a must. This is exactly what she needed! She loves the color (mom is not crazy over the white, but it's a "thing" with the girls at her school..hopefully it will stay clean and/or clean well). There's plenty of pockets too, to help her keep things separated.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy in N.C.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t wash it
customer_reviews.text: This bag is advertised as a backpack and gear bag for sports. Which leads me to believe it should we washable. However upon washing all UA lettering and logo came off in my washing machine. My child is of course now upset and a wasn’t thrilled to pick all that vinyl out of my machine. Would return if it wasn’t out of the window and certainly won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Great decision
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed for what I paid. Seem like it's very well made and lots of fifer to pockets. Even for full pair of large shoes! I'm 100% satisfied and would buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: RjTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Size: using as a daily for gym, backpacking and work
customer_reviews.text: The bag is great and I use it for almost everything: gym, backpacking and work. It's big enough to fit in 3 laptops easily (1-17", 2 -15.6"). The 17" however, fits into the main compartment itself, and not the laptop sleeve given. The backpack is very convenient to carry and lightweight. I also found the bottom compartment very useful and am able to carry shoes/old clothes/ and just about anything in that. It is not like a traditional backpack with multiple compartments/places to put pens and stuff, but more like a multi-purpose gym/traveling backpack
customer_reviews.author: Sahib Dhanjal

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room at the bottom (also extends), comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I like products that I can rely on daily, and the ones that also hold up from usage. The compartments in this backpack is a little funky, but it's a nice city commuter for those who don't want to hurl around a massenger bag. It takes abuse, it does its job and the zippers hold up very, very well. Nicely done, UA! Thanks for the great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sean L.

customer_reviews.title: I am a huge fan of Under Armour backpacks
customer_reviews.text: I am a surgical sales rep. This bag works great for keeping my OR shoes away from all of the rest of my stuff. The ergonomics are great for all of the catalogs and devices I tote around. I am a huge fan of Under Armour backpacks, they are well made and durable. I know they are meant for athletes, but I wish they would bring out a “professional” line with the same quality, thoughtfulness, and ergonomics for the traveling professional.
customer_reviews.author: Harr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this backpack for a 7 day trip. Used it as a bag for extras and outings. 7 days of sun and sand and this backpack was perfect! Durable and plenty of space and compartments. I especially love the zippered separate compartment in the bottom for shoes...it’s completely separate from the rest of the bag so no sand or dirt or moisture contaminated the contents of the main compartment.
customer_reviews.author: TroyKat

customer_reviews.title: 5 star
customer_reviews.text: Full ratings. Loved the product. Had been a year using this bag and it still looks the same and gives me the same comfort. Highly durable. Edits: 8/20/2020. I bought this bag in 2018. Its been 2 years and the bag is still the same. Still new. It doesnt get dull. None of its pocket is damaged. A Must Must buy for this product rather then going for the high priced products.
customer_reviews.author: Harsh

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my nephew because he saw one on a commercial and wanted one but I opted for this one because it was larger than the other UA Hustle and we were glad I did. He’ll be a freshman this year and he loves this bag. It’s suitable for a man as well. The bottom zips open to reveal a cool large pocket to hold shoes, gloves and ball, etc. very nice!
customer_reviews.author: LISA LOUTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Thick and durable bag.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughters upcoming school year. It’s very pretty, it looks more of a bright coral than it does online. The dark trimming of the bag is also a deep purple. It’s really pretty. Nice quality and very thick. Lots of compartments.
customer_reviews.author: jasmine bounds

customer_reviews.title: Definite must have.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this bookbag for over a year now. I am impressed with how well it has held up. I use it everyday for work and traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Walters

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This bookbag is exactly what I needed. I go to the gym approx 5 days a week, and teach group fitness classes. I needed a bag where I can easily find small stuff like batteries, mic screens, etc, and also have space for my cycle shoes, towel, water bottle, clothes, etc. This bag has a ton of storage, and has some pockets in the larger spaces to help with organization. The straps are nicely padded, as well. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: My son love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my son to take to school. He love it so did I snd the price was good. It's a strong bag.
customer_reviews.author: Nedia

customer_reviews.title: It works. What else do you want?
customer_reviews.text: It zips. It feels comfortable on my back. It holds my 13 inch MacBook Pro comfortably. It fits in the "personal item" category for luggage. It is everything I wanted. I spent 3 weeks in Germany with this on everyday and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Herr Antrim

customer_reviews.title: More streamlined than most...
customer_reviews.text: We bought and gave this to our grandson who is 12 years old and in the sixth grade. He loves it and uses it daily and it, after the first two months of school appears to still be like new. It’s more streamlined than most backpacks, so it doesn’t pull the wearer backwards as most of them seem to do.
customer_reviews.author: Majac3356

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and strong backpack.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this backpack. Shes in 7th grade and has a bunch of books binders and stuff for school and everything she needed on the first day fit perfectly inside it. She had locker shelves (2) 9 one inch binders, 2 pencil cases, book covers, and a few more things and it wasnt to heavy it held the weight evenly for her. It is an amazing backpack and will last for the next couple years also.!
customer_reviews.author: Jessicaa

customer_reviews.title: The last back pack you'll ever buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing made it through my sons senior year of high school & now lives in the back of his car. Still not showing any signs of wear & tear. That's saying a lot from someone who had to purchase no less than 2 back packs a school year because he destroyed them all within months
customer_reviews.author: E-Rob

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my high school son to use for the school year. It only lasted 4 months and it has already torn at the top part. Huge hole in the top. My son is very careful and takes care of his stuff. So disappointed in UA and do not recommend this bookbag to anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda E

customer_reviews.title: This bag appears cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: This bag I received was made of a silky thin material with a silkscreened on under Armour logo. The right side shoulder strap wasn’t even sewn on. I’m pretty sure the bag I received was a knock off. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tallana

customer_reviews.title: Not loving it
customer_reviews.text: This back lacks a smaller key pocket or zip area for small items and material seems incredibly cheap. We have had other sturdier under armor backpacks and if we had seen this in a store we would not have selected it. It just doesn't have the features you've come to expect in a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: H's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My son goes to school with him. He likes this backpack. I will also buy it for my younger son,at the time of discounts :)
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Choice Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my high school daughter. This was there first year we didn't buy her an L. L. Bean back pack. This item was roomy, durable and very stylish. She loves the zipper bottom, where she can pack an extra pair of shoes, sneakers and even stash her jacket away when the weather warms up later in the day.
customer_reviews.author: coolpd127

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy and (mostly) water resistant. I wouldn't put anything too prone to water damage in the outer pocket. The straps feel like it's hugging me, it's a good fit. I love the bottom shoe pocket and I put my gym clothes there. I like the design and use of space. This is a really nice bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Decent backpack
customer_reviews.text: I got this backpack for the gym, it carries my cable handles and cable rope and jump rope. I was hoping that the material used for the backpack was of better quality, but it looks like thin fabric and some plastic. I give this backpack 2 years tops before it starts getting holes.
customer_reviews.author: Quang Cao

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this backpack but....
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this backpack - it is handsome and had so many compartments and pockets. But...if you use the pockets, it can't stay upright - it is so top heavy - the only zippered enclosures are on the front. I have rearranged my stuff a million times to try to make it work, but it just doesn't stand up. That makes it more difficult to use - it flies off the seat driving, it falls over everywhere. If that doesn't matter to you, then it is a great backpack, but it doesn't suit my needs enough but was too expensive to not use......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack, doesn't "sit" on the floor
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay backpack. Seems a little cheapy- we'll see how long it lasts. The back is very rigid, so when my son tries to set the backpack on the floor to pack it, it falls forward, and irritates him. Even with trying to put his shoes in the bottom, it still doesn't sit up. We love the water bottle pocket - holds a large waterbottle securely.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Smith

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, durable, lots of storage compartments.
customer_reviews.text: This is durable and has comfortable carry straps. There are a lot of compartments for easy storage and organization. I really like the bottom zipper shoe storage for the kids sports season!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Okay bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for college, but it was too small to hold my daily items and the shoulder straps caused pain around my shoulders and neck whenever I would carry the bag, which none of my previous backpacks have done. I ended up ordering another bag for school, and my mom uses this for travel now.
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Material not high quality, unimpressive compartments
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed with the quality of this backpack. Material was very plastic-y and thin. Zippers were not very smooth. Inner compartments where just thin sheets of material. I much prefer the high quality of my North Face Recon backpack. It has more compartments with lining and zipper compartments within. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Johnson

customer_reviews.title: USAFAMILY1
customer_reviews.text: Bought this backpack for my 10yr old son. Its pretty durable and plenty of space for a grade school kid. He carried a gray one for the past 2yrs and its still in good shape but he wanted a change so we got the camo one and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: STOLEN?
customer_reviews.text: It came with the security sensor on it. WAS THIS STOLEN?
customer_reviews.author: Giant

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th year in a row buying this backpack for my autistic teen son. Holds up great for the school year. We still have all of the previous years still and they are still in great shape
customer_reviews.author: Karen Reed

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: When I was looking at a back pack for work I had some family members tell me there was no point in having a waterproof backpack. Well, when leaving the office and hit with a sudden downpour it saved my laptop and everything inside it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua B.

customer_reviews.title: Not enough room
customer_reviews.text: Still undecided about this bad... There is defiantly no room for shoes in the bottom pocket. My 14 year old freshman son packs a laptop and lunch box and there is no room for anything else. It does seem durable just no very roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: He loved it so much but it seems little price for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teenage son travelling overseas.He loved it so much but it seems little price for the size but the colour is perfect as pictued.I don't know maybe I am used to Walmart as a poor America😊😊
customer_reviews.author: dodo

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack for high school and extracurricular
customer_reviews.text: This bag is excellent for getting through the school day while carrying the extra curricular items. The bottom compartment truly can accommodate a men's size 10 shoe and the other out compartments are well organized. Very good quality bag
customer_reviews.author: Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great book bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6th grader. She had one for 5th and it worked great. Fits all of her stuff including lap top. Comfortable for her to wear. Lasts forever. We would’ve used the one from last year but a slime disaster happened. :)
customer_reviews.author: JennyW

customer_reviews.title: Not Large Enough For High School Student
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my high school son. This is a very nice backpack, but it is not big enough for him. Please do not get me wrong - it is spacious but not enough for what a high school student would need in my opinion. (Returning)
customer_reviews.author: South Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and roomy backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. I bought it to replace my laptop bag to carry my laptop in. The laptop bag was bulky, heavy and awkward. This bag is the total opposite. I put my laptop, books, notebooks, and accessories in it and it is comfortable and roomy and not as heavy to carry. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: becka74

customer_reviews.title: Binder only... sorry!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sturdy bag, everything is as pictured. Only problem is its so small that a 3 inch binder makes it impossible to put in a lunch bag or a sweatshirt in it as well, wouldn't recommend this for a high schooler or a middle schooler.
customer_reviews.author: Ruiwen Tavari

customer_reviews.title: Okay book bag
customer_reviews.text: It’s an okay back pack. I do use it for school but it doesn’t sit up right which bothers me but other than that I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Vanderploeg

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: This was bought to replace the last Under Armour one my son had that lasted him 4 years of daily abuse! And since this one is following him to college, can't wait to see how long it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy C in NJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this backpack for our son for school. The color is awesome, and great quality for the price. It has a ton of storage n pockets. I highly recommend this backpack for school or traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great material, very durable. I’ve had this backpack over 3 years and its still in great condition after daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I really like the bag ! Very comfortable!! It’s quite big for regular just 1 laptop in my bag.. Depends on if you want to buy spacious bag or smaller one
customer_reviews.author: Anuka

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Christmas. 2 months later and it has rips and frays. Expect better from under armor! This is a 14 yo using with pretty much a chrome book in it.Sent and email about 2 weeks ago and haven’t heard a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Packergirl12

customer_reviews.title: Emblem Chips Quickly
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get my backpack but within 4 uses, the Under Armour emblem is chipping. The emblem is silver and underneath is black so it’s pretty noticeable and I’m pretty disappointed. With the price and brand, I assumed it would hold up longer but if you don’t care what it looks like, it’s got many pockets that are decent size.
customer_reviews.author: Lissifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but smaller than what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The back pack looks nice, but it is smaller than the last Under Armour back pack that my son had. He likes it and wants to keep it....I’m just not sure he will be able to fit all of his books for 6th grade in it.
customer_reviews.author: MD1011

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bag
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bag, take my tablet among other things from school, this is the second one I bought, would recommend this,WELL WORTH THE MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Rummel

customer_reviews.title: A year late review!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to wait to see if this bookbag would last and its held up very well. It’s perfect for a student with heavy books and there has not been very much wear and tear on it at all!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Elkins

customer_reviews.title: but I like it. I'm able to use it well because ...
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I had anticipated, but I like it. I'm able to use it well because I'm a woman. A grown man might not like the sizing of it though. Otherwise it has held up great!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Hineman

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to carry things back and forth to work. Has plenty of room large compartments, a water bottle pouch on the side. I’ve had a lot of weight in it and never had an issue with the stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn K

customer_reviews.title: Under armour is the best.
customer_reviews.text: Being a huge Under Armour fan, I was highly satisfied with this bag. Great for school, love the size, not too big, not too small. Fits my laptop and books great. Also looks great and is really comfortable to wear. Doesn’t stick out far or anything. Great for college.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Tedrow

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 12yr old son. he loves that he can fit a basketball in it. He gets lots of compliments on the colors maroon and orange looks nice together. Satisfied all the way around
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: If you don’t want bells and whistles this is fine.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my fifth grader. The color is bright and looks pretty good. This backpack is roomie. Cons: the straps has no pads or pockets and no clip on the straps. Overall is a nice looking backpack with different zippers and is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Costumer

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking if you want longevity.
customer_reviews.text: VERY disappointed with this purchase. Read the reviews, took a chance, wish I hadn't. Appeared as though had sturdy construction, but looks can be deceiving. Strings started unravelling within a couple weeks of using. Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.author: wattsjr

customer_reviews.title: Durable Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was exactly what my 18 year old daughter was looking for, she started college and a backpack she purchased hurt her back, so we tried this bag, and it was amazing. Very durable and stylish. I would highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for running
customer_reviews.text: This bag moves around too much when I’m running! I wanted a bag that is good to run with. No front strap! Going with the Northface bag next time.
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: excellent for a college student as it has a laptop ...
customer_reviews.text: Very durable backpack, excellent for a college student as it has a laptop pocket and lots of space for books and everything I needed to carry daily. Very comfortable to carry around no matter how heavy it gets!
customer_reviews.author: Ashton C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Very stylish. High quality. Purchased for my 11 year old son who started 6th grade and he loved it. Enough room for his Chromebook, lunchbox, gym uniform and more! Very comfortable straps. Overall, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Alex F.

customer_reviews.title: Water resistant, tough, lasts years
customer_reviews.text: I love these backpacks. I buy a different color every year for my kids tough school use. At the end of the year they still look amazing. Like new. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift for a great price. My tween grandsons were so excited it was one of their gifts at Christmas. Big and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for daughte's volleyball gear
customer_reviews.text: She loves it. That is always my goal with her bc she is a picky one! She spends a lot of time searching for stuff on Amazon:)
customer_reviews.author: World Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the backpack - great color, seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Boland

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag!
customer_reviews.text: Bag has been used everyday for a month by a tough teenager and still looks brand new. Nice and roomy. Love the shoe pouch!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd grader uses the for school. It is holding up great with almost 4 months of use - shoved in locker and tossed on the floor in his room - and still looks like new. I love the color of this one too!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter, and it works well for her schoolbag. It’s comfortable and just the right size. It’s made well and has just enough pockets/ compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for school and sports!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my son who is in middle school. It is the perfect size for school and will also be great for sports. I love the large pocket on bottom because he can store dirty shoes and gym clothes without them being next to his school books or laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Young

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality zipper
customer_reviews.text: Overall the backpack is great but after only 4 months of minimal use, the zipper for the main pocket is broken and the backpack can no longer be used.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Savich

customer_reviews.title: Nice back pack
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son picked this out for this school year. He seems to like it and it holds a lot of stuff. He has only been using it for 2 months but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Ramey

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this backpack for my 6th grader and it is amazing! It holds all his books and then some. The laptop compartment protects his Chromebook so I don't worry about it getting damaged. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Horinek

customer_reviews.title: Manny from Brooklyn
customer_reviews.text: My every day carry on love it, perfect size it's what i was looking for .
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Louis

customer_reviews.title: sensor was NOT removed before shipping!!
customer_reviews.text: The product was fine and looked as to be expected and as shown in the pictures; however, when it was delivered, the ink tag sensor was still on the backpack! Now I have to take it to a store and ask them to remove it, but I also was not given a paper invoice so I will have to prove to the store that I bought this item and didn't steal it by showing them my phone receipt...annoying and an inconvenience!
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: great water resistant back pack that fit's a laptop
customer_reviews.text: my son needed a new back pack for college. It fits his 15 inch laptop computer and it's water resistant. Stylish as well. He likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son uses this at school. It’s held up great especially with how rough he is with it. The quality is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Shiggy

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Decent amount of space and seems like it will hold up fairly well. The material feels a bit cheap, however.
customer_reviews.author: cntrygrl023

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for college and she said that she loves it and still uses it! It has held up very well and the price is perfect for the durability!
customer_reviews.author: sonja lester

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality gym bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my seven-year-old grandson who was going to his first competitive gymnastics meet and he wanted a bag just like the big guys have. It was a huge hit. He was very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Renee M.

product_meta.title: Under Armour unisex-adult Hustle 3.0 Backpack
product_meta.description: UA Storm technology delivers an element-battling, highly water-resistant finish .Tough, abrasion-resistant bottom panel .Soft-lined laptop sleeve—holds up to 15” MacBook Pro or similarly sized laptop .Water-repellent front valuables pocket to keep your stuff safe .Adjustable HeatGear shoulder straps for extra comfort .Large, gusseted front laundry/shoe pocket placed at bottom of bag .Two side water bottle pockets .Top grab handle .Dimensions: 9.3" x 13.6" x 18.9" (Width x Length x Height) .
feature_bullets: UA Storm technology delivers an element battling, highly water resistant finish
Soft lined laptop sleeve—holds up to 15" MacBook Pro or similarly sized laptop
Water repellent front valuables pocket to keep your stuff safe
Adjustable HeatGear shoulder straps for extra comfort
